src_original: kathaṃ bhedāśaṅkinaḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何不解捉舍羅？

src_original: caturdaśānāṃ bhedakarāṇāṃ vastūnām anyatamānyatamad bhedakaraṃ vastu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati,  evaṃ bhedāśaṃkinaḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  kathaṃ aparāvṛttaprayogena śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?  na sthalasthān upādāya yāvan na sthaviraḥ;  evam aparāvṛttaprayogena śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 於此諍事不決了，不知是法非法乃至說不說，是為不解捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ na gatiṃgatisārathitayā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何不與善伴共捉舍羅？

src_original: ye te bhikṣavo bhavanti sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharās tasmin dharmavinaye gataya ucyante;
tgt_original: 若比丘多聞持法、持毘尼、持摩夷，不與作伴法非法乃至說不說，是為不與善伴捉舍羅。

src_original: jānan śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatārā bhikṣavaḥ adharmaṃ samādāya vartiṣyanta ity evaṃcittāḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  evaṃ jānan śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavo adharmavādino bhaviṣyanti iti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 『此諍事多有如法比丘，我今當捉非法舍羅，令非法比丘多。

src_original: nāpy eva ḥśalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  nāpy evaḥ śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  ḥnaḥ jānaṃ śalākāgrahāṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gḥṇanti; (A 344a)
tgt_original: 『此諍事非法比丘多為非法伴捉舍羅。

src_original: nāpy eva jānaṃ chalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhānti?
tgt_original: 』是為知非法比丘多捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ dharmeṇa śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何欲令僧破捉舍羅？

src_original: saṃghasāmagryā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  kathaṃ nālpāvaramātrakeṇa (Adhik-v 93)  śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?  na saṃvarakaraṇīyaṃ na deśanākaraṇīyam iti kṛtvā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 『此諍事如法比丘多，我今捉非法舍羅令眾僧破。

src_original: evaṃ nālpāmātrāvaramātrakeṇa śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 』是為欲令眾僧破捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ na bhedāśaṅkinaḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何知僧當破捉舍羅？

src_original: caturdaśānāṃ bhedakarāṇāṃ vastūnām anyatamānyatamad bhedakaraṃ vastu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati;  evaṃ na bhedāśaṅkinaḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 彼比丘知非法比丘多，為非法伴黨捉舍羅，是為知僧當破捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ na parāvṛttaprayogena śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何非法捉舍羅？

src_original: sthalasthān upādāya yāvat sthaviraḥ;  evaṃ na parāvṛttaprayogena śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 白二白四羯磨，白異羯磨異，是為非法捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ gatiṃgatisārathitayā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 云何別眾捉舍羅？

src_original: ye te bhikṣavo bhavanti sūtradharā vinayadharāḥ mātṛkādharās tasmin dharmavinaye gataya ucyante;  sārathayas tān avalokya śalākāṃ gṛhnanti;  evaṃ gatiṃgatisārathitayaiva śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  kathaṃ nāpi śalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho ḥbhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gṛhnanti;  nāpy eva śalākāgrahaṇena saṃghoḥ bhedaṃ gamiṣyatīty evaṃcittāḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  evaṃ nāpy eva śalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 同一界羯磨不盡集，應囑授者不囑授，在現前應呵者便呵，是為別眾捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ nāpy eva śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 云何以小犯事捉舍羅？

src_original: nāpy eva śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmaṃ samādāya vartiṣyante iti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  evaṃ nāpy eva śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 或念犯罪、或不故犯、或發心作如是捉舍羅，是為小犯事捉舍羅。

src_original: kathaṃ ḥnaḥ jānaṃś śalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  na jānan śalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhedaṃ gamiṣyatīti evaṃcittā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  evaṃ na jānan ḥśalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalakāṃ gṛhṇanti;  kathaṃ na jānanḥ śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ śalākāgrahaṇena adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  na jānan śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ  adharmaṃ samādāya vartiṣyante ity evaṃcittā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 云何不如所見捉舍羅？

src_original: evaṃ ḥnaḥ jānan śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 異見異忍捉舍羅，是為不如所見捉舍羅。

src_original: imāni daśa dhārmikāṇi śalākāgrahaṇāni;
tgt_original: 是為十種非法捉舍羅。

src_original: yathāpitad bhikṣuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāṃ pāyattikāṃ pratideśanikāṃ duṣkṛtām āpattim apannaḥ tam (A 345b)  enaṃ bhikṣavas tena vastunā codayanti;  sa tena vastunā codyamānaḥ saṃghāt smṛtivinayaṃ yācate;  tasya saṃghaḥ smṛtivinayaṃ dadāti,  adhārmikaṃ smṛtivinayadānaṃ;  tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 彼從僧乞憶念毘尼，僧若與憶念毘尼者非法。

src_original: ḥsa tena vastunā codyamānaḥ saṃghāt smṛtivinayaṃ yācateḥ;
tgt_original: 問言： 『汝憶犯重罪不？

src_original: amūḍhavinayārhaḥ sa;  yathāpitad vastuko bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti,
tgt_original: 『我不憶犯重罪波羅夷、僧殘、偷蘭遮，我憶犯小罪已如法懺悔。 諸長老！

src_original: ḥtasya bhikṣavaḥ smṛtivinayaṃ dadati,  adhārmikaṃ smṛtivinayadānam;  tat kasya hetoḥ?  ḥ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyārhaḥ sa;
tgt_original: 』而諸比丘故難詰不止。 彼從僧乞憶念毘尼，若僧與憶念毘尼者非法。

src_original: itīmāmi trīṇy adhārmikāṇi smṛtivinayadānāni (Adhik-v 98)
tgt_original: 是為三種與非法憶念毘尼。

src_original: āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ katamam?
tgt_original: 云何犯諍？

src_original: pañcāpattayaḥ āpattiskandha ity ucyate;
tgt_original: 犯七種罪： 波羅夷、僧伽婆尸沙，乃至惡說，是為犯諍。

src_original: pārājikāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣikāḥ pāyattikāḥ pratideśanīyāḥ duṣkṛtāḥ,  tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam ucyate āpattyadhikaraṇam (Adhik-v 72)
tgt_original: 言諍中事作，覓諍中事作，犯諍中事作，是為事諍。

src_original: kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ katamam?
tgt_original: 「言諍以何為根？

src_original: yā saṃghasya kriyājñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya yāḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam ucyate kṛtyādhikaraṇam  The vivādādhikaraṇam
tgt_original: 貪恚癡為根、無貪無恚無癡為根、僧為根、界為根、人為根、六諍為根、十八破事為根，是為言諍根。

src_original: kiṃmūlaṃ bhikṣavo vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiṃ vivādādhikaraṇasya mūlam?
tgt_original: 覓諍以何為根？

src_original: ṣaḍ vivādamūlāni caturdaśa bhedakarāṇī vastūni
tgt_original: 貪恚癡為根、無貪無恚無癡為根、僧為根、界為根、人為根、三舉事為根，是為覓諍根。

src_original: (A 336b) ṣaḍ vivādamūlāni katamāni?
tgt_original: 犯諍以何為根？

src_original: The kṛtyādhikaraṇam  kiṃḥmūlaṃḥ bhikṣavaḥ kṛtyādhikaraṇam,  kiṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇasya mūlam?
tgt_original: 犯諍以何為根？ 貪恚癡為根、僧為根、界為根、人為根、三舉事為根、六犯所起為根，是為犯諍根。 事諍以何為根？

src_original: yā saṃghasya kriyājñaptiḥ jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma idaṃmūlakaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kṛtyādhikaraṇam idam kṛtyādhikaraṇasya mūlam  The three kinds of vivādādhikaraṇam
tgt_original: 貪恚癡為根、無貪無恚無癡為根、僧為根、界為根、人為根，是為事諍根。

src_original: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam;
tgt_original: 「言諍是善、不善、無記。 言諍或善、或不善、或無記。

src_original: katarat kuśalam?
tgt_original: 云何言諍是善？

src_original: yat saṃghasyārthinaḥ arthābhiprāyasya kuśalārthinaḥ kuśalābhiprāyasya ḥnānāvādo (Adhik-v 76)  vivādo vipratyanīkavādaḥḥ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idaṃ kuśalam;
tgt_original: 比丘共比丘善心諍言，法非法乃至說不說，作如是相共彼此諍言，是為言諍善。

src_original: katamad akuśalam?
tgt_original: 云何言諍不善？

src_original: yaḥ saṃghasyānarthinaḥ anarthābhiprāyasyākuśalārthinaḥ akuśalābhiprāyasya nānāvādo vivādo vipratyanīkavādaḥ tad upādāya kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam akuśalam;
tgt_original: 若比丘共比丘不善心諍言，法非法乃至說不說，以如是相共諍言諍，以此遂成鬪諍，是為言諍不善。

src_original: katamad avyākṛtam?
tgt_original: 云何言諍無記？

src_original: yat saṃghasya naivārthino ḥnaivānarthinoḥ naivārthābhiprāyasya ḥnaivānarthābhiprāyasyaḥ  na kuśalārthino ḥnākuśalārthinaḥ na kuśalābhiprāyasya nākuśalābhiprāyasyaḥ nānāvādo  vivādo vipratyanīkavādaḥ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam avyākṛtam
tgt_original: 若比丘以無記心諍言，引十八事法非法乃至說不說，以如此事互共諍言，是為言諍無記。

src_original: The three kinds of anavavāddhikaraṇam  anavavādādhikaraṇaṃ kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalam vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ vaktavyam;  katarat kuśalam?
tgt_original: 覓諍是善、不善、無記耶？ 覓諍或善、或不善、或無記。

src_original: yat saṃghasya arthinaḥ arthābhiprāyasya kuśalārthinaḥ kuśalārthābhiprāyasya anavavāda  anavavādanam anavavādaprasthāpanaṃ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idaṃ kuśalam;  katarad akuśalam?
tgt_original: 云何覓諍是善？

src_original: anavavādanam anavavādaprasthāpanaṃ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam avyākṛtamḥ  The two kinds of āpattyadhikaraṇam  āpattyadhikaraṇam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ ca vaktavyam;  katarad akuśalam?  yo buddhaprajñaptāyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ saṃghaprajñaptāyāṃ ca kriyāyām saṃcintya vyatikramaḥ idam akuśalam;
tgt_original: 破戒、破見、破威儀見聞疑，內有五法，令此人無犯無垢污、清淨罪得出，莫令此人有惡名稱流布，以如是相覓罪共語，不妄求伴勢力安慰其心，作舉作憶念、安此事不安此事、不癡令脫，是為覓諍事善。

src_original: avyākṛtam? yo buddhaprajñaptāyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ saṃghaprajñaptāyāṃ ca kriyāyām asaṃcintya vyatikramaḥ idam avyākṛtaṃ  The three kinds of kṛtyādhikaraṇam  kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ kuśalaṃ vaktavyam akuśalaṃ vaktavyam avyākṛtaṃ ca vaktavyam;  katarat kuśalam?
tgt_original: 若比丘共比丘以不善心覓罪，以三舉事：

src_original: yat saṃghasyārthinaḥ (A 338a)  arthābhiprāyasya kuśalārthinaḥ kuśalābhiiprāyasya jñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanam vigraho vivādaḥ idaṃ kuśalam;  katarad akuśalam?  yat saṃghasyānarthinaḥ anarthābhiprāyasya akuśalārthinaḥ akuśalābhiprāyasya jñaptir  jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ idam akuśalam;
tgt_original: 破戒、破見、破威儀見聞疑，內無五法，欲令此人有犯垢穢不清淨、罪不出，欲令此人不善名流布，以如是相覓罪共語，不妄求伴勢力、不安慰其心，作舉作憶念、安此事不安此事、癡不脫，是為覓諍事不善。

src_original: katarad avyākṛtam?
tgt_original: 云何覓諍事無記？

src_original: jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya kalaho bhaṇḍanam vigraho vivādaḥ idam avyākṛtam  Not all kinds of vivāda,  etc.,
tgt_original: 破戒、破見、破威儀見聞疑，以如是相覓罪共語，不妄求伴勢力安慰其心，作舉作憶念、安此事不安此事、無癡令脫，是為覓諍事無記。

src_original: are a source of adhikaraṇa  yo vivādas tad adhikaraṇaṃ yac cādhikaraṛam sa vivādaḥ?  āha: syād vivādo nādhikaraṇam,
tgt_original: 「犯諍是善、是不善、是無記也。 犯諍或不善、或無記。

src_original: syād adhikaraṇaṃ na vivādaḥ,  syād vivādaś cādhikaraṇaṃ ca,  syān naiva vivādo nādhikaraṇam; 1)  vivādas tāvan nādhikaraṇam,  yat saṃghasya nānāvādo vivādaḥ vipratyanīkavādaḥ; 2)  adhikaraṇaṃ na vivādaḥ,
tgt_original: 云何犯諍是不善？

src_original: trīṇy adhikaraṇāni anavavādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)  vivādāś cādhikaraṇaṃ ḥcaḥ,  yaḥ saṃghasya nānāvādo vivādo vipratyanīkavādaḥ asāmagrī asaṃmodamāna anekotībhāvaḥ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ; 4)  syān naiva vivādo nādhikaraṇam,  etān ākārān sthāpayitvā (Adhik-v 78)
tgt_original: 若凡夫人學人故犯罪，是為犯諍不善。

src_original: yo 'navavādas tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ so 'navavādaḥ?
tgt_original: 云何犯諍無記？

src_original: āha: syād anavavādo nādhikaraṇam;
tgt_original: 若凡夫人學人不故犯戒，無著人不故犯戒，是為犯諍無記。

src_original: syād adhikaraṇam nānavavādaḥ;  syād anavavādaś cādhikaraṇaṃ ca;  syād naivānavavādo nādhikaraṇam; 1)
tgt_original: 「事諍是善、是不善、是無記，事諍或善、或不善、或無記。

src_original: yaḥ saṃghasya anavavādaḥ anavavādanaṃ anavavādaprasthāpanam; 2)  adhikaraṇam nānavavādaḥ,  trīṇy adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)  anavavādaś cādhikaraṇaṃ ca,
tgt_original: 比丘以善心言諍中事作、覓諍中事作、犯諍中事作，是為事諍善。

src_original: catvāri śalākācāraṇāni;
tgt_original: 「云何覆藏行舍羅？

src_original: channaṃ vivṛtaṃ sakarṇatuntunakaṃ sarvasāṃghikaṃ ca;  channaṃ śalākācāraṇaṃ katamat?
tgt_original: 『此諍事如法比丘多，而彼和尚、阿闍梨不如法，我等若顯露行舍羅，恐諸比丘隨和尚、阿闍梨捉舍羅。

src_original: yathāpitat śalākācārakasya bhikṣor evaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 』彼比丘應覆藏行舍羅。 彼作如是念：

src_original: asminn evāvāse prabhūtāḥ sthavirā bhikṣavo adharmavādināḥ alpās tu navakā bhikṣavo dharmavādinaḥ;
tgt_original: 『此諍事如法比丘多，彼眾中有上座標首智人者，持法、持毘尼、持摩夷而住非法。

src_original: ahaṃ ced vivṛte śalākāṃ cārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yan navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām anuvidhīyamānāḥ prabhūtām adharmaśalākāṃ gṛhṇīyuḥ;
tgt_original: 若我等顯露行舍羅者，諸比丘隨彼眾中上座標首智人住非法者捉舍羅。 』是比丘應覆藏行舍羅。 二句不知亦如上。

src_original: yanv aham channe śalākāṃ cārayeyam iti sa channe śalākāṃ cārayati;  idam ucyate channam śalākācārṇam; (A 343a)
tgt_original: 應如是行舍羅，從二種乃至如法滅諍已，後更發起得波逸提，如上顯露行舍羅。

src_original: ḥvivṛtaṃ śalākācāraṇaṃ katamat?
tgt_original: 「云何為耳語行舍羅？

src_original: ḥ yathāpitat śalākācārakasya bhikṣor evaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 彼比丘作如是念：

src_original: asminn āvāse prabhūtāḥ sthavirā bhikṣavo dharmavādinaḥ alpās tu navakā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādinaḥ;
tgt_original: 『如法比丘多，彼和尚、阿闍梨非法說。

src_original: ahaṃ cec channe śalākāṃ cārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yan navakā bhikṣavaḥ adharmaśalākāṃ gṛhṇīyuḥ;  yanv aham vivṛte śalākāṃ cārayeyam;
tgt_original: 』彼應耳語行舍羅。 彼比丘作如是念：

src_original: vivṛte śalākāṃ cārayataḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām anuvidhīyamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ dharmaśalākāṃ gṛhṇīyuḥ iti;
tgt_original: 『此諍事如法比丘多，而彼眾中上座智人標首比丘住非法持法、持毘尼、持摩夷。

src_original: sa vivṛte śalākāṃ cārayati,
tgt_original: 』彼比丘應耳語行舍羅。

src_original: tvam api dharmaśalākāṃ gṛhāṇa,
tgt_original: 應作二種舍羅：

src_original: tvam api dharmaśalākāṃ gṛhāṇa iti;  idam ucyate sakarṇatuntunakaṃ śalākācāraṇam;
tgt_original: 應作白『如是語者捉完舍羅；

src_original: sarvasāṃghikaṃ śalākācāraṇaṃ katamat?  yathāpitac chalākācārakasya bhikṣor evaṃ bhavati,  asminn āvāse prabhūtā bhikṣavo glānāḥ,
tgt_original: 如是語者捉破舍羅。

src_original: prabhūtā bhikṣavaḥ adharmaśālākāṃ gṛhṇiyuḥ na tv ahaṃ sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite  śalākāṃ cārayeyam iti sa sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite śalākāṃ cārayati,  idam ucyate sarvasāṃghikaṃ śalākācāraṇam (Adhik-v 91)  The ten distributions of voting tickets that are not legally valid
tgt_original: 』彼行舍羅時，應希坐間容一人身小障翳，彼比丘作耳語，語言： 『汝和尚、同和尚、阿闍梨、同阿闍梨、親厚知識已捉舍羅。

src_original: apy eva śalākāgrahaṇe saṃgho bhetsyati iti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 汝亦當捉舍羅，慈愍故。

src_original: apy eva ṣalākāgrahaṇe prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādinaḥ bhaviṣyantīti;  jānan śalākāgrahaṇena saṃgho bhetsyatīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  apy eva jānan śalākāgrahaṇena prabhūtatarā bhikṣavaḥ adharmavādino bhaviṣyantīti śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti
tgt_original: 』若如法比丘多，諍事得滅得功德多。 行舍羅已，在一面數之，從此乃至如法滅諍已，後更發起得波逸提如上。

src_original: katham adharmeṇa śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?  na vinayānulomena śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti,  evam adharmeṇa śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  kathaṃ vyagrāḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?
tgt_original: 有十不如法捉舍羅：

src_original: na saṃghasāmagryāṃ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti,  evaṃ vyagrāḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;  katham alpamātrāvaramātrakeṇa (A 343b)  śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti?  saṃvarakaraṇīyaṃ deśanākaraṇīyam iti viditvā śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti,  evam alpamātrāvaramātrakeṇa śalākāṃ gṛhṇanti;
tgt_original: 不解捉舍羅、不與善伴共捉舍羅、欲令非法者多捉舍羅、知非法比丘多捉舍羅、欲令眾僧破故捉舍羅、知眾僧當破故捉舍羅、非法捉舍羅、別眾捉舍羅、以小犯故捉舍羅、不如所見故捉舍羅。
